summary: ON JUNE 28, 2007 I PURCHASED A 1999 DODGE INTREPID FROM ARNALDO GARCIA HE TOLD ME THE ENGINE HAD BEEN REBUILT AND HE SAID THE CAR WAS IN GOOD WORKING CONDITION.  IN JULY 2007 I BEGAN TO HAVE PROBLEMS ONLY 14 DAYS AFTER PURCHASING THE VEHICLE FOR $2900 IN CASH (AS HE REQUESTED) I HAVE A RECEIPT WITH HIS NAME AND SIGNATURE STATING THAT I PAID HIM CASH.  AS OF AUGUST 12, 2007 THE CAR NO LONGER WORKS.  I HAVE CONTACTED HIM ON AUGUST 16, 2007 AND HE REFUSED TO GIVE ME MY MONEY BACK OR FIX THE CAR.  *JB
